templates.description: Short have a nice weekend email.
templates.body: Good evening all,Great work this week. Wish you all a great weekend!.Greetings,

templates.description: Late for work because of traffic.
templates.body:
Good morning,

Traffic is a bit heavy today and I'll be 5-10 minutes late to work.

Greetings,

templates.description: Can't come to work - headache and fever
templates.body:
Good morning,

I woke up with a headache and a fever today and unfortunately won't make it to work.
On my way to the doctor rn.

Greetings,

Hello,

I have arrived at the meeting place.

Greetings,

Здравейте,

За съжалеине може и да не успея да предам проекта си навреме.
Моля за извинение.

Поздрави,
